summary:
Drs. Theo J. P. M. Bögels, owns Laguerma Consultancy, and was board member and Managing Director of PEN Psychodiagnostics, a well known organization in Holland, founded more than 32 years ago, that published several psychological tests (amongst which the Bar-On EQ-i and EQ-i 2.0, MSCEIT, GAMA, MMPI-2-RF, MMPI-2 and MMPI-A). Member of the MMPI-3 taskforce in NL. Theo, after having been a member of the Dutch navy for a short period of time, studied Physical Therapy, (Clinical) Psychology at the Radboud University of Nijmegen and (later) Forensic psychology at the University of Amsterdam, The Netherlands. He often is asked to teach as part of postgraduate educational programs in Psychology or Business Administration and facilitated numerous workshops and presentations on (Psycho-)diagnostics, Personal development, Emotional Intelligence and other subjects. As of April 2022 PEN transferred the licences for the above mentioned tests To Pearson Clinical.

Theo also works as a consultant for several organizations and facilitates programs for personal/organizational development or change. Several companies see him as a versatile coach for their top executives. Workshops in The Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Austria, and Switzerland on a demand basis. He also trained high potentials in France and Croatia and facilitated workshops in the UK. He is a member of MHS'​ Consulting Network of Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He worked as a forensic expert for the Dutch Department of Justice (and was as such registered in the Netherlands Register of Court Experts). Expert in the "San Clemente Syndrome", after facilitating workshops on this subject in Roma, Italy.

Specialties: Expert in Emotional Intelligence (EQ-i model and MSCEIT model). Expert in MMPI-2/A/RF interpretation. Forensic psychology. Offered as a MHS Training Partner EQ-i 2.0 certification in Dutch and German speaking Europe. Languages: Dutch (F), German (F), English (F), French (I), Italian (B). Further: EMDR, Neurofeedback, Psychodynamic interventions.
